args: The gravestone Yoshitsune addresses\nis inscribed with the following:
Marie, Beloved Daughter of Khan\n\nRest in Peace, Little One
Forty years after that birthday celebration,\nGonzales passed away surrounded by his\nmany children.
Ten years later, Messa and Daniela—\nwho had married—passed on at the same\nmoment, each holding the other's hand.
You're the one who sent me the letter.\nYou're Marie's...
Her granddaughter, yes. Grandmother\ntalked about you all the time, Khan.

She said you were a wonderful person who
raised her in place of her birth mother.
But she also said she didn't see you again
after she was married.

I was a flashy and successful mercenary,
which attracted the ire of a fair number of
business rivals. I pulled away in order to
keep her from getting involved.
Yes. She was muttering in her sleep that\nshe wanted to see Mama, although she\ncan't really tell who is who anymore.
I see. But I'm going inside regardless.
It's me, little one. Khan.\n...It's been a long time.
You don't remember. Well, I suppose\nwe have both earned our fair share of\nwrinkles, haven't we?
Surprising, isn't it? Yes, it got pretty hard\nto keep fighting in my old body.

A few years ago, deep in the mountains of
Taiwu, a legendary qigong master taught
me a secret technique to become young
again—if only for a little while.
It's Mama... Mama is here...\nWelcome home, Mama...
Heh. You do love my stories.
Yeah...they're super fun...\nand you're so cool...in them...
Let's see, then. Where should I begin?

People fear of death because they do not know
what lies beyond. And yet, there is nothing more
sorrowful and terrifying than watching an endless
parade of loved ones move on without you.
This is why I finally decided to cast away\nmy undying body.
I tried every method I could think of and met with\nfailure each time. But just when I thought I would\ngo mad, I suddenly remembered something...

Each of these Wyrmclans has a leader
who forms a pact with a dragon—but in
doing so, their soul is diminished,
along with their lifespan.
Several years after Marie's passing\nHinomoto—The Estate of the Rooster

How many decades had it been since
I was last there? I suppose I could call
it fortunate that the Rooster clan had no
other successors.
Fortunately, Yoritomo's envoy from that day\nwas still alive, and with his backing\nI managed to succeed the clan.
Thanks to that, I was able to swear a\nsoulpact, but will it truly allow me\nto die, I wonder?

Lady Yoshitsune, a messenger from the
Ox has come to offer greetings and
congratulations on your selection as a
Wyrmclan leader.
It is ever such a pleasure to make your\nacquaintance. I am Rikugo, a shikigami\nin service to the Ox wyrmclan.
My lord planned to come in person today,\nbut as it happens, he has seen the recent\nbirth of a grandchild—a sweet baby boy.
However, his daughter has experienced\npostpartum difficulties, so he appointed\nme to serve as his representative.

I apologize myself. Though I was most
occupied with the succession, it still
ought to have been me, as a new leader,
that set out to offer greetings.
I will have a feast prepared. Pray stay and\nallow us to treat you by way of apology.
Please spare yourself the trouble. With\nmy master's words delivered, I'm to return\nhome immediat.... My! How mysterious.

I feel a most inexplicable power from you,
Lady Yoshitsune. It is the ominous power
of Tsukuyomi. And it appears to be of
life unending.
Hmm. It would appear you have a story.\nPlease articulate the particulars to me.
...Ah, I see. It sounds as though your\npower over death comes from the water.
That was no mere water; I think it likely\nyou drank a miraculous elixir from\nTsukuyomi known as ＂ochimizu.＂
Tsukuyomi? The dragon who lost to\nAmaterasu in ancient times? How could\nBenkei have had access to such a thing?
Of that, I know as little as you.\nNonetheless, it is a matter most\ntroublesome.

Per your position, you have forged
the soulpact and should see your life
shortened—and yet, the ochimizu sees
that it is continually replenished.
The power of ochimizu is great—too great,\neven, for the prodigious power of onmyodo\nto sway your situation.
You will enjoy a long life despite having\nmade a soulpact. For a Wyrmclan leader,\nthis is the finest of things.

Yet if knowledge were to get out, the other
Wyrmclan leaders would doubtless defect
to Tsukuyomi's side in order to reap the
benefits of the ochimizu.

In my estimation, it would be wise for you
to keep word of your body and its
resilience to yourself and not share it
with the other Wyrmclan leaders.
Answer something for me: What is the\nrelationship between the Wyrmclan\nleaders and Tsukuyomi?
As you left Hinomoto before the formation\nof the shogunate, it is no surprise that you\nwould be ignorant of the situation.

Tsukuyomi disapproves of a shogunate
ruling Hinomoto, and has banded together
a group of rebels to plot its downfall.
They call themselves the Mukuroshu.
As such, Amaterasu has issued a secret\ndirective to the Wyrmclan leaders that they\nare to be exterminated.
In particular, my master—the leader of the\nOx wyrmclan—has been tasked with\nhunting the Mukuroshu.
If Tsukuyomi's elixir made me this way,\nshe might also possess the power to return\nme to a normal lifespan.
And if I go after the Mukuroshu,\nI'll likely find Tsukuyomi...
Would it be acceptable for me to hunt\nthis group as well, Rikugo?
That would be extremely delightful and\nauspicious. I shall inform my lord at once.
I held no interest in Hinomoto's fate;\nI wished only to die a natural death.
And in order to make that happen, I was willing\nto use anything available to me. The Wyrmclans,\nthe Mukuroshu...anything.
